attributes.action: Iain Duncan Smith to explain why £75,000 of taxpayers money on media training
attributes.additional_details:
We call on Iain Duncan-Smith to explain why he has spent nearly £75,000 on media training for Lord Freud and DWP staff to be trained to handle media relations.  Part of this money was also spent on clothing to make certain these people look smart in front of the camera.

We call for an investigation into this outrageous waste of taxpayers money.
